Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at The Marble Arch by Montcalm, you'll be centrally located in London, minutes from Marble Arch and Selfridges. This 5-star hotel is close to Harrods and Buckingham Palace.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 42 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and minibars. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms have designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of The Marble Arch by Montcalm. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of The Marble Arch by Montcalm. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Marble Arch - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Portman Square - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Hyde Park Speakers' Corner - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Selfridges - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Wallace Collection - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Grosvenor Square - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Wigmore Hall - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Madame Tussaud's Wax Museum - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Royal Academy of Music - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Berkeley Square - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Hyde Park - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Oxford Circus - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
London Business School - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Regent's Park - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Crescent Gardens - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 14.6 km / 9 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 20.7 km / 12.8 mi

The preferred airport for The Marble Arch by Montcalm is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
